item.title: Proton: Privacy by default
item.description: 1 free email address Custom email domains Use your own custom email domain addresses, e.g., you@yourname.com 150 messages per day Bulk promotional or programmatic email sending is currently not supported. We recommend using a dedicated email service provider for this use case.
